job description:
Corning is one of the world’s leading innovators in materials science. For more than 160 years, Corning has applied its unparalleled expertise in specialty glass, ceramics, and optical physics to develop products that have created new industries and transformed people’s lives.

Corning succeeds through sustained investment in R&D, a unique combination of material and process innovation, and close collaboration with customers to solve tough technology challenges.

The global Information Technology (IT) Function is leading efforts to align IT and Business Strategy, leverage IT investments, and optimize end to end business processes and associated information integration technologies. Through these efforts, IT helps to improve the competitive position of Corning's businesses through IT enabled processes. IT also delivers Information Technology applications, infrastructure, and project services in a cost efficient manner to Corning worldwide.

SCOPE/PURPOSE OF POSITION: Assist in maintaining the Apptio IT financial management tools to support Cost Management processes. Apply industry standard IT cost analysis, modeling, and reporting practices (per the Technology Business Management (TBM) Council) aid in the development of standard reports and analysis for Corning Incorporated IT division. Work across and engage with Cost Analysts, Service Lines, and with Business unit IT.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Administrative set-up and management of the Apptio Tool set.
  • Support project schedules for implementation and expansion of capabilities.
  • Reconciling and quality checking data including financial records.
  • Using Apptio tools to identify data sources and model configurations to support user interpretations.
  • Maintain adherence to the ‘Data Freshness’ schedule.
  • Create configuration of Apptio business intelligence tools to model Corning Incorporated IT costs, financial plans, internal recovery, and external benchmarking.
  • Develop, improve, or create custom cost analysis reports in collaboration with service Line management or cost analysis requirements as assigned.
  • Participate in developing and documenting standard TBM processes for Corning.
  • Assist Analysts where needed
  • Complete Apptio certification training as assigned.
  • Assist in process development.
EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS:
  • MBA/ BA Degree in Engineering or Finance preferred.
  • Apptio certification will be required as assigned.
WORK EXPERIENCE: Technical acumen in Business Intelligent tools or the like and experience developing processes

REQUIRED SKILLS:
  • Advanced (Excel) spreadsheet competencies including dataset management and pivot table reporting. • Effective organization, and planning skills, with ability to handle changing priorities
  • Excellent communications, interpersonal and influencing skills
  • Demonstrated track record of on time delivery of analytical reports to successful conclusions using influencing tools
  • Ability to work as part of international teams across that span various lines of business, geographic borders, time zones, and cultures
  • Must be a self-starter, able to work in team environment and motivate others
DESIRED SKILLS:
  • Advanced personal computer user
  • Advanced spreadsheet design & data analytics
  • TBMA training to be completed successfully
  • Presentation skills
  • Reporting / Desk Top Publishing
  • Fundamental accounting / finance understanding
TRAVEL: 5% average (10% peak) travel required, international and domestic
